advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Ready to start a conversation?  With Mango Languages’ Library Edition App you can get free access to over 40 foreign language courses and 15 English courses taught in the user’s native language.  

You must have an account with a library that subscribes to Mango Languages to use this app.  Run into issues?  Just contact the Mango Customer Service Team at 1-877-626-4611 or support@mangolanguages.com.

Mango's unique methodology, Intuitive Language Construction™, mimics the natural process in which people learn by presenting material through practical conversations.  Every lesson incorporates the four conversational components that are critical to effective communication in a foreign language: vocabulary, pronunciation, grammar and culture.

Available courses for English speakers: 
• Arabic (Egyptian)
• Arabic (Levantine)
• Arabic (MSA)
• Armenian
• Azerbaijani
• Bengali
• Chinese (Cantonese)
• Chinese (Mandarin)
• Croatian

releaseNotes: Mango Mobile Library Edition 1.3.0 is a maintenance release that fixes a couple bugs on iOS 7. Additionally, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Bengali, Hungarian, Kazakh, Malay, Malayalam, Punjabi, Scottish Gaelic, Serbian, Telugu, Yiddish, ESL Arabic (MSA), and ESL Armenian have been added to our course database.
